rooms.description: North-facing entrance with traditional colonial style archways. The area is designed to welcome guests according to Vastu principles, ensuring auspicious entry.
Spacious living room with colonial style wooden paneling and large windows for natural light. Features comfortable seating, traditional decor elements aligning with Vastu orientation.
Colonial dining room with elegant furniture and a view of the swimming pool area. Designed for social gatherings, following Vastu principles to enhance positivity.
Modern colonial kitchen with integrated pantry and storage solutions, designed in a North-east quadrant as per Vastu for positive energy and culinary excellence.

A dedicated library/study area with colonial design, abundant natural light, built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating to inspire creativity. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by being placed in a west direction.
Primary bathroom located near the kitchen with colonial fixtures and modern finishes. Ensures privacy while following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
A decorative swimming pool area with accompanying deck, designed to create a relaxing ambiance and aligning with Vastu recommendations for leisure spaces.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden. Features colonial style architecture and ample natural light, designed as a bachelor pad.
Secondary bedroom with a dedicated balcony providing private outdoor space. Maintains colonial aesthetics and follows Vastu principles for restful energy.
Large balcony attached to master bedroom with lush greenery and seating areas. Enhances ventilation as per Vastu.
Balcony attached to secondary bedroom, offering private outdoor space with colonial charm and natural elements.
Service area for laundry and storage, designed to be discreet yet functional. Placed strategically according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A grand colonial style entrance door aligning with the North-facing facade, ensuring positive Vastu flow.
Large windows on the living room to allow ample natural light and ventilation.
Balcony window integrated into master bedroom for natural light while providing privacy.
Sunlight maximizing windows to enhance the study environment.

meta.design_notes: This design integrates colonial aesthetics with Vastu principles, ensuring a harmonious flow of energy and functionality. The layout maximizes natural light and open spaces while respecting the plot dimensions.
